path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - MetaSpets Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Missing constraint checking for TGE and monthly release percentages
findings.description: The MSPVesting.sol contract lacks constraint checking for TGE and monthly release percentages.

findings.title: EggBasket.sol - WhiteList check should be skipped for contract owner
findings.description: The whitelist check is not necessary for contract owners only (users with DESIGNER_ROLE), and it should be removed.

findings.title: EggBasket.sol - Basket price is mismatched with the default value
findings.description: In the mint function of the EggBasket contract, the value of the price field in the basketDetail struct is mismatched with the basketPrice variable.

findings.title: Wrong description of monthlyDuration
findings.description: The variable monthlyDuration has a wrong description.

findings.title: Redundant check in the calculateClaimable function
findings.description: The _now < monthlyStartAt check can be done with the elapsedMonths < 1 check in the calculateClaimable function.

findings.title: Unused OwnableUpgradeable
findings.description: EggBasket and MSPIdo contracts inherit both the OwnableUpgradeable and AccessControlUpgradable contracts but the onlyOwner modifier of the OwnableUpgradable contract is not used anywhere in the code.
